entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 8:13AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RELEASE OF GLACIER DAMMED LAKE ON THE SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER CONTINUES... WATER LEVELS ON THE SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER, ALASKA BEGAN RISING BEYOND THE NORMAL DAILY RISE ON SUNDAY NIGHT. THE RIVER HAS GONE UP OVER 5 FEET AS OF WEDNESDAY MORNING. IN THE PAST, THIS EVENT LASTS ABOUT 4 DAYS FROM START TO FINISH, WHICH WOULD PUT THE CREST ON
entry.cap:areaDesc: City of Hyder

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:40PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On The Colville River This Week... Runoff from heavy rainfall over the upper Colville River Basin is moving downriver this week. Between 1.00 to 1.75 inches of rain fell between Sunday morning to Monday morning in the foothills of the Brooks Range.
